description: Get, send and update data in Redis

essential_properties.name: key
essential_properties.description: Name of the key to delete from Redis

essential_properties.name: propertyName
essential_properties.description: Name of the property to write received data to. Supports dot-notation. Example: "data.person[0].name".

essential_properties.name: key
essential_properties.description: Name of the key to get from Redis

essential_properties.name: key
essential_properties.description: Name of the key to increment

essential_properties.name: keyPattern
essential_properties.description: The key pattern for the keys to return

essential_properties.name: key
essential_properties.description: Name of the key to set in Redis

essential_properties.name: list
essential_properties.description: Name of the list in Redis

common_operations.name: Get
common_operations.description: Get the value of a key from Redis

common_operations.name: Increment
common_operations.description: Atomically increments a key by 1. Creates the key if it does not exist.

common_operations.name: Info
common_operations.description: Returns generic information about the Redis instance

common_operations.name: Keys
common_operations.description: Returns all the keys matching a pattern
